lead_paragraph: After basking in the spotlight of a career season, the Carolina Panthers and quarterback Cam Newton fell flat under the glare of the world's biggest stage.

headline.print_headline: Newton Wilts Under Super Bowl Spotlight
headline.main: Newton Wilts Under Super Bowl Spotlight
